tasks.name: SetupMonorepoProjectStructure
tasks.description: Generate a Turbo monorepo with Next.js App Router, Tailwind, and CI setup
tasks.prompt:
Set up a production-grade Turbo monorepo for a Next.js 14+ App Router project with the following:
- `apps/web` with `/app` directory structure
- `packages/ui` for shared UI components
- TailwindCSS, ESLint, Prettier
- PostHog or Vercel Analytics integration hooks
- `.github/workflows` CI for build, lint, test
- Storybook + Screenshot Previews enabled in `packages/ui`

Ensure `layout.tsx` and `page.tsx` exist. Output project tree.
